name: .FILTERS File Extension
summary: Learn about .FILTERS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File filter created by Visual C++, which is part of Microsoft's Visual Studio development software; contains ordering rules for displaying file types within the Visual Studio Solution Explorer panel; used for storing filter settings for a specific project.

content: FILTERS files are often seen with the compound extension ".vcxproj.filters" since they are commonly related to Visual C++ project files (.VCXPROJ extension). FILTERS files are saved in an XML format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
